page.title: 04Pensilva School.
page.content: {Pensilva School}was opened in{1913 with 154 pupils. These numbers fell over the years until the 1960's when there were about 80 pupils. As the village grew so the school grew to over 200 pupils.By 1985 this had levelled off at about 190. The school had changed a lot-new kitchens and toilets had been built and there were 5 temporary classrooms in the grounds. {A new school is now being planned. There are events such as Sports Day, Swimming Gala,Open Evening and Christmas parties and concerts. The {Parent Staff Association}run a Summer Fete, bazaars and sales to raise money for the school.The money has been used for televisions, musical equipment and books but mostly for{the swimming pool which{has a roof and solar heating. Catherine Margaret Abbey. { Sally Anne Frances Page.
